summary:
Tool to simply Kill the Skyrim process(when its stuck, etc)
-> ENB-Version kills stuck ENB-processes, too
Recommended to link to keyboard
-> one button/combination, Skyrim is closed
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Georgia][size=3][u]I like Things easy:[/u][/size][/font]
[/b][i]Tool to simply kill the Skyrim process(TESV.exe)(when its stuck, etc) -> ENB-Version kills stuck ENB-processes, too
Recommended to link to keyboard -> one button/combination, Skyrim is closed
That´s it.
[/i][u][size=3]
[b][font=Georgia]Ok to be serious:[/font][/b][/size][/u]
[i]I created this little tool, because my Skyrim kept gettin into endless loadingscreens, or crashed and the ENB-process didn´t kill itself. 
Because of endless sessions of ctrl+alt+del, which kept getting on my nerves, I finally created this little console application.
Simply link it via your mouse or keyboard driver to a button and you are good to go.

[size=1](Excuse any mistakes, my englisch is out of a textbook(+I din´t really pay attention during lessons, my bad))

[/size][/i]-> looked into better ways to kill processes that are totally stuck beyond repair, but it seems like there just are no good ways when using windows...
author: ChooseJapan
